entries.title: Equality Statistics for the Northern Ireland Civil Service - 2026
entries.summary: This report presents equality statistics for staff in the Northern Ireland Civil Service at 1st January 2025. Equality statistics are presented by grade level and cover gender, community background (Protestant/Catholic), age group, ethnicity and disability. Some comparisons with the workforce composition in previous years are also given. The report also includes an analysis of recruitment, promotion and leavers. Subject to review, these statistics will be released between May and June 2026

entries.title: Motoring offences statistics in Northern Ireland to 31 October 2025
entries.summary: Monthly update of statistics relating to Motoring Offences in Northern Ireland.
entries.display_date: The publication of the October 2025 motoring offences figures has been delayed until 29th January 2026. This is due to the significantly earlier than usual publication date, as a result of the holidays, thus creating potential for the latest figures to be less complete, as well as resource constraints caused by long-term absence within the team.
entries.status: The publication of the October 2025 motoring offences figures has been delayed until 29th January 2026. This is due to the significantly earlier than usual publication date, as a result of the holidays, thus creating potential for the latest figures to be less complete, as well as resource constraints caused by long-term absence within the team.

entries.title: Material Footprint in Northern Ireland 2001 to 2022
entries.summary: This report explores the material footprint for Northern Ireland, based on estimates produced by the University of Leeds.

entries.title: Northern Ireland Degree Study Choices 2024/25
entries.summary: This factsheet outlines the factors influencing individuals’ decisions to pursue degree level study and the reasons some choose not to. It also explores attitudes towards tuition fees.

entries.title: Northern Ireland: International Reputation in Focus
entries.summary: Research exploring how perceptions of Northern Ireland (NI) influence global attitudes toward investment, study, tourism, favourability and familiarity with NI.

entries.title: Profiling suicide, drug and alcohol deaths in Northern Ireland
entries.summary: Research outlining the socio-economic associations with suicide, drug-related and alcohol-specific deaths in Northern Ireland.
